This website contains notes and information for the module *Food Process Design & Optimisation* ("Food Pro" for short).

## Lectures and Schedule

This module involves two lectures each week.

Lectures will be at **9 am Tuesday (CONN_S3)** and **2 pm Thursday (FSB_322)**.

There are 6 laboratory practicals in this module, which will not start until **3 weeks into term**.
More detail will be provided before the labs start.

::: {.callout-note}
## How You Will Be Assessed

Assessment for the module is as follows:

- 15%: in-class exam
- 15%: lab reports
- 70%: formal exam 
:::

The content of the course has the following *general* structure:

- **Food Physics**
- **Fluid Statics**
- **Fluid Dynamics**
- **Separation Science**
- **Thermal Processing**
- **Evaporation & Drying**
- **Bulk Solids Science**
- **Sustainable Processing**
- **Topics in Engineering**

Individual topics can take 2-4 lectures to complete, depending on class interest and progress.

Some topics may not be covered if the class needs additional time on a specific topic.
Only topics covered in lectures will be examined.
